text: Sir Carlyle Arnold Glean, GCMG (11 February 1932 - 21 December 2021) was a Grenadian politician. He became Governor-General of Grenada on 27 November 2008 until 7 May 2013. Glean died on 21 December 2021, at the age of 89. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Governors- General of Grenada Category:Alumni of the University of East Anglia Category:University of Calgary alumni
title: Carlyle Glean
